reasoning: Urticaria reported as prevalence (not incidence) since it's a chronic/recurrent condition. Global prevalence estimated at ~10% (10,000 per 100k) based on dermatological epidemiology studies. Chronic urticaria prevalence 0.6-1.5%, acute/episodic urticaria much higher; aggregate estimate represents active cases.
source: Dermatological epidemiology consensus; WHO disease prevalence estimates
